title: Coast to Coast AM - September 5th 2009 - Armageddon & Religion
description:
Armageddon & Religion

Date:
 09-05-09
 
Host:
 Ian Punnett
 
Guests:
 Michael Baigent, Michael H. Stone 
 
Bestselling author and controversial religious theorist Michael Baigent (book link) will discuss how fundamentalist leaders of Christianity, Islam and Judaism are secretly working to hasten the end of the world, in order to bring about the prophecies of their holy texts. 

First hour guest, Michael H. Stone, M.D. (book link), will talk about rating the evils of crime.
